name: tm53
effect: Teaches Energy Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Energy Ball to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user draws power from nature and
fires it at the foe. It may also lower
the target’s Sp. Def.

fires it at the foe. It may also lower
the target’s Sp. Def.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A nutrient-draining attack. The user’s HP is restored
by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the
target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.
